H0.text: What is the surname of the film director whose first names are Francis Ford. Capra

H3.text: What is the surname of the film director whose first names are Francis Ford. Coppola

A4.text: Francis Ford Coppola is an American filmmaker.

A5.text: Coppola is the recipient of five Academy Awards, a BAFTA Award, three Golden Globe Awards, and two Palmes d'Or.
